remarks: The modal axiom GL implies the modal axiom (4).  Note that the antecedent of ~ bj-gl4 is an instance of the axiom GL, with ` ph ` replaced by ` ( A. x ph /\ ph ) ` , sometimes called the "strong necessity" of ` ph ` .  (Contributed by BJ, 12-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement: bj-gl4 $p |- ( ( A. x ( A. x ( A. x ph /\ ph ) -> ( A. x ph /\ ph ) ) -> A. x ( A. x ph /\ ph ) ) -> ( A. x ph -> A. x A. x ph ) ) $.
